word_mean: 病理学：医学上研究疾病本质的一个分支，特别是研究引起疾病或由疾病造成的机体器官和组织的结构和功能变化
疾病的结构和功能的表现

sentence.Network_en: The eighteenth century saw the devolopment of modern pathology and experimental surgery.
sentence.Network_cn: 18世纪是近代病理学和实验外科学发展的开端.

sentence.Network_en: I guess I have to throw the ball back at Pathology.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想我只有把这个烫手的洋芋扔还给病理部门.

sentence.Network_en: I do believe some changes in Pathology are necessary.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为病理部门的确需要改善.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from modern or medieval Latin pathologia (see patho-, -logy)

entry.def: Pathology is the study of the way diseases and illnesses develop.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of medical science that studies the causes and nature and effects of diseases
2. any deviation from a healthy or normal condition

stems_affixes.word_buile: a无,缺乏+path感情+etic表形容词→无动于衷的
path感情+etic表形容词→动感情的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 缺乏感情或兴趣, 冷漠
stems_affixes.word_buile: a无,缺乏+path感情+y状态→n.缺乏感情或兴趣, 冷漠
electro=electr电+path感情,痛苦,病+y→用电治病→电疗
path病+ology学科→病的学科→病理学
sym共同+path感情+y状态→共同感情→同情
